name: coffeelint-prefer-english-logical-operator
description: A custom coffeelint rule to prefer english style logical operators

scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.prebuild: coffeelint -q src test && mocha -R nyan --require coffeescript/register "test/*.coffee"
